name: Central Pacific Financial Corp.
description: Central Pacific Financial Corp. is a Hawaii-based bank holding company that provides a range of financial services through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Central Pacific Bank. Founded in 1954, the company has established a strong presence in the Hawaiian banking sector, offering personal and business banking services, including deposits, loans, and investment products. Central Pacific Bank is committed to serving the diverse financial needs of its customers with a focus on community engagement and local involvement. The bank operates numerous branches across the Hawaiian Islands, providing accessible banking solutions to both individuals and businesses. Central Pacific Financial Corp. emphasizes financial education and customer service, aiming to empower its clients with the knowledge and resources necessary for financial success. The company's mission revolves around fostering economic growth in Hawaii, supporting local businesses, and contributing to the overall well-being of the communities it serves. Moreover, Central Pacific Financial Corp. is actively involved in various philanthropic initiatives, focusing on education, health, and environmental sustainability, reflecting its dedication to corporate social responsibility. As a public company, CPF is committed to transparency and accountability in its operations, ensuring that it meets the expectations of its stakeholders while navigating the challenges of the modern banking landscape.

seo.meta_title: Central Pacific Financial Corp. | Banking and Financial Services in Hawaii
seo.meta_description: Explore Central Pacific Financial Corp., a leading bank in Hawaii offering a wide range of personal and business banking services. Learn about our commitment to community and financial education.

faq.question: What services does Central Pacific Bank offer?
faq.answer: Central Pacific Bank offers personal and business banking services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, and investment products.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Central Pacific Financial Corp.?
faq.answer: Paul K. Yonemura is the CEO of Central Pacific Financial Corp.

faq.question: Where is Central Pacific Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Central Pacific Bank is headquartered in Honolulu, Hawaii, USA.

faq.question: When was Central Pacific Financial Corp. founded?
faq.answer: Central Pacific Financial Corp. was founded in 1954.
